class_notes: This class meets in person TTh, with an additional in-person Friday session at the same time in a location TBA.
course_description: This is the first of two courses that introduce students to modern Mandarin Chinese. It covers the sound system of Mandarin Chinese and moves on to basic skills in listening, speaking, reading, and writing, and offers an introduction to Chinese culture. For non-heritage students only.
